tasks.title: Initialize Astro Project and Tailwind CSS
tasks.description: Set up the foundational Astro project structure with Tailwind CSS for styling, adhering to the repository structure defined in the PRD.
tasks.details: Run 'npm create astro@latest' with the 'minimal' template. Install Tailwind CSS via 'npx astro add tailwind'. Create the directory structure: src/content/posts, src/components, src/layouts, and src/pages. Configure astro.config.mjs for static site generation (SSG).
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the dev server starts without errors and Tailwind utility classes are applied correctly in a test component.

tasks.title: Define Content Collection Schema
tasks.description: Implement the Zod schema for the 'posts' content collection to enforce frontmatter requirements.
tasks.details: Create src/content/config.ts. Define a 'posts' collection using the 'defineCollection' and 'z' from 'astro:content'. Schema must include: title (string), publishedDate (date), updatedDate (date, optional), status ('seed' | 'sprout' | 'tree'), tags (array of strings), and summary (string).
tasks.testStrategy: Create a Markdown file in src/content/posts with missing required fields and verify that the Astro build fails with a Zod validation error.

tasks.title: Implement Markdown Post Rendering and Layout
tasks.description: Create the dynamic routing and layout for individual blog posts.
tasks.details: Create src/layouts/PostLayout.astro for the general post structure. Create src/pages/posts/[...slug].astro. Use 'getCollection' to fetch posts and 'render()' to convert Markdown to HTML. Ensure the layout displays the title, date, and status badge.
tasks.testStrategy: Add a 'hello-world.md' file to src/content/posts and navigate to /posts/hello-world to ensure content renders correctly.

tasks.title: Develop Semantic Concept Block Components
tasks.description: Create specialized styling for 'Core Ideas', 'Open Questions', and 'Supporting Evidence' within Markdown content.
tasks.details: Implement CSS classes or a remark plugin to identify patterns like '[!QUESTION]' or '[!IDEA]'. Create a ConceptBlock component in src/components/ConceptBlock/ that applies high-contrast borders and background colors based on the block type (e.g., blue for ideas, amber for questions).
tasks.testStrategy: Insert custom block syntax into a test post and verify that the rendered HTML applies the correct CSS classes and visual styles.

tasks.title: Implement Git Evolution Tracker Module
tasks.description: Create a utility to extract file commit history using Git commands or a library like simple-git.
tasks.details: Create a module in src/lib/git-history.ts. Use 'simple-git' to run 'git log --follow' on a specific file path. Return an array of objects containing { date, message, hash }. Handle the edge case where a file is not yet committed by returning an empty array or a 'Draft' status.
tasks.testStrategy: Log the output of getFileHistory() for an existing file in the console during build and verify it matches the actual git log output.

tasks.title: Build Post History UI Component
tasks.description: Display the evolution of a post at the bottom of the post page using the Git history data.
tasks.details: Create src/components/History/PostHistory.astro. This component should take a file path as a prop, call the Git Evolution Tracker, and render a vertical timeline of commits (date and message). Style it to look like a GitHub commit list.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify that the bottom of a post page displays a list of previous commits associated with that specific Markdown file.

tasks.title: Create Maturity-based Filtering and Homepage
tasks.description: Develop the homepage list with the ability to filter or sort by post maturity (Seed, Sprout, Tree).
tasks.details: In src/pages/index.astro, fetch all posts using 'getCollection'. Implement a UI toggle or filter bar. Use Tailwind to color-code badges: Seed (gray), Sprout (green), Tree (dark green/emerald).
tasks.testStrategy: Click on a 'Seed' filter on the homepage and verify that only posts with 'status: seed' are visible.

tasks.title: Develop GitHub-style Activity Heatmap
tasks.description: Create a visual grid component showing update activity across the repository.
tasks.details: Create src/components/Profile/ActivityHeatmap.astro. Aggregate all commit dates from the repository. Map these dates to a 52-week SVG grid. Use color intensity (Tailwind greens) to represent the number of updates per day, similar to the GitHub profile heatmap.
tasks.testStrategy: Manually verify that days with multiple commits show a darker green color than days with single or no commits.

tasks.title: Configure GitHub Actions Deployment
tasks.description: Set up the CI/CD pipeline to deploy the static site to GitHub Pages.
tasks.details: Create .github/workflows/deploy.yml. Use the 'withastro/action' to build the project. Ensure the workflow has permissions to write to 'gh-pages' branch. Configure 'astro.config.mjs' with the correct 'site' and 'base' URL for GitHub Pages.
tasks.testStrategy: Push a commit to the main branch and verify that the GitHub Action completes successfully and the site is accessible at the username.github.io/repo URL.

tasks.title: Final UI Polish and Profile Header
tasks.description: Implement the GitHub-profile-inspired header and finalize the aesthetic.
tasks.details: Create src/components/Profile/ProfileHeader.astro containing user bio, avatar placeholder, and global stats (total seeds, sprouts, trees). Apply a consistent 'GitHub-lite' theme across the site using a specific Tailwind color palette (e.g., slate and emerald).
tasks.testStrategy: Perform a visual audit of the site to ensure it matches the 'GitHub-profile-inspired' requirement and all links are functional.
